entry.data:
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS EARLY THIS EVENING, THEN SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE MORNING, THEN THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
